field.name: summary
field.value: IsGreaterValidator and IsLesserValidator don't handle nulls correctly

field.name: description
field.value:
When either the field being validated or the reference field is null the IsGreaterValidator will throw an exception - IsLesserValidator does not, but will only return "valid" when both the field and reference field values are null or an empty string - I believe this should return true when either field is null/empty, and should obviously be consistent across both the IsGreater and IsLesser validators.
Patch supplied.

comment.author: bittercoder
comment.text:
I have attached patch which (GreaterandLessPatch.patch) that:
* Corrects the behavior of the IsGreaterValidator / IsLesserValidator so they are consistent/correct. * Adds a test fixture for the IsLesserValidator which was missing.
